bug.author: tszumowski
bug.summary: [üêõBUG] Minor Typo on Atomic Files Page
bug.description:
I wasn't sure where or what repository this HTML is generated in. But there is a minor typo in <denchmark-link:https://recbole.io/atomic_files.html>https://recbole.io/atomic_files.html</denchmark-link> . Under , it says . I believe that should say
Go to <denchmark-link:https://recbole.io/atomic_files.html>https://recbole.io/atomic_files.html</denchmark-link>
Expected behavior See description
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10282962/99967161-743c7c80-2d65-11eb-8823-0dc83831e512.png></denchmark-link>
Colab Links If applicable, add links to Colab or other Jupyter laboratory platforms that can reproduce the bug. Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: [e.g. Linux, macOS or Windows] RecBole Version [e.g. 0.1.0] Python Version [e.g. 3.79] PyTorch Version [e.g. 1.60] cudatoolkit Version [e.g. 9.2, none]

comments.comment: Thanks for your corrections. We have fix this problem in our website pages.
